title.rendered: Trafalgar Travel First Aid Kit 75 Piece

content.rendered:
This Trafalgar Travel First Aid Kit is equipped to treat burns, fractures, CPR and more. This case is a compact size so that it can easily fit inside the car glove box or amongst travel gear. This kit contains 75 essential items that you might need when you are not at home, travelling or on the road.

  • Kit contents:
    5 x adhesive mini strips
    2 x adhesive round plasters
    20 x adhesive strips
    1 x antiseptic cream sachet
    1 x bandage conforming 7.5 cm
    1 x burnaid sachet20 x cotton buds
    1 x cpr shield 2 x disposable latex gloves
    1 x eye pad
    1 x first aid guide
    1 x gauze swab 5 cm 2p
    2 x resealable bags
    10 x safety pins
    1 x splinter probe
    1 x triangular bandage
    1 x tweezers
    1 x wound dressing
    3 x wound wipes

excerpt.rendered:
• Enhanced Content, Treats More Injuries
  • Fits Easily Into Luggage, Backpacks Or Glove Box
  • An Essential Travel Accessory On A Holiday!
  • Treatment: Bleeding, Burns, Fractures And CPR
